name: The weird goblin running away from a wall
name_original: The weird goblin running away from a wall
description:
You are a weird gobling and you need to run away from a death wall and shoot your way to victory in this fast paced 2D platformer.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is made for a controller but you can still use a keyboard.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controller controls are said in game.

Jump: Space

Shoot: Mouse Buttons

Run: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Exit: Escape

Reset: R

BEWARE THE SOUNDS ARE REALLY LOUD AND I DIDN'T HAVE TIME TO ADD A VOLUME SLIDER!!!
